name: releqg
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

body.origin:
|- wrel(c0)
-| wrel(co(c1, cqg, c2))

⊣ d(hs2, hs3)
⊣ d(hs2, hs0)
⊣ d(hs2, hs1)
⊣ d(hs3, hs0)

⊣ d(hs0, hs1)
⊣ d(hs2, 𝕌)
